welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Carson, where the beauty of the Rocky Mountains meets the charm of small town living. Known for its rich military history and breathtaking scenery, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Colorado Springs Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Colorado Springs Airport is used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free WiFi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butts AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Butts AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at USAF Academy Airstrip Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at USAF Academy Airstrip Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
